item.description:
We will be discussing current events at the local and national levels, what is happening with Bob Underwood's race for US Senate in MA, and the Barr / Root campaign.

Many members are much concerned about the apparent takeover of the LP by the neocons, and Barr's many apparently non-libertarian positions. Come discuss this and share your opinions about what should be done to deal with this question.

In addition, talk about what is happening with local libertarian activities, and share good conversation and fellowship.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess for the "Lowell Area Liberty Association" Important note - please RSVP so that I can tell the restaraunt how many to expect, and get an appropriate size table.
item.name: The Route 495 Area Libertarian September Meetup
